a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 1 year-39

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC vaccines: Whole-cell (WC) vaccines schedule

def.name: No cholera primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No cholera primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: No cholera primary series dose was administered-116

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC vaccines: Whole-cell (WC) vaccines schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC-rBS vaccine 3 doses: Whole cell-recombinant B subunit (WC-rBS) vaccine, 3-dose schedule for clients aged 2–5 years

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC-rBS vaccine 2 doses: Whole cell-recombinant B subunit (WC-rBS) vaccine, 2-dose schedule for clients aged over 5 years

a:s.a:s: "Number of Cholera Primary Series Doses Administered"
